name: Overview

[{"id":"adf5f27f-4ffb-41c0-9167-6a2d6aa7e9bd","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Method Documentation: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_edge","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e7eec0ac-11ab-44ea-b0fd-5d7791ee48d2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_edge","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method is the core engine for building the call graph. Its primary responsibility is to create a directed link between a source namespace and a destination namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c47efa4e-d309-4335-b938-9f22cb9acc3d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Crucially, this method includes sophisticated ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"normalization and filtering logic","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Static analysis often generates "internal" namespaces to track control flow (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"while","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" blocks) or data structures. To ensure the final call graph represents clear functional relationships rather than internal engine state, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_edge","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" strips away these artifacts and ignores irrelevant primitive data.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e60570af-7148-4d9c-a7e1-1f954607072c","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"f51c29df-3959-4375-a4e7-f74ff09c0a87","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Parameters","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9b0773d4-64c7-48c8-b1d7-ab03fea461f4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"src","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"str","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The namespace of the caller (the entity initiating the call).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"717d61c9-386a-47a4-870d-3f195b08b190","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"dest","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"str","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The namespace of the callee (the entity being called).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7dd9ee27-8d2a-4ad7-8295-2bf0c9a34167","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"7c2417ec-8476-4ac6-9c8f-b8cd9db58748","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Logic & Filtering","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"91ddf103-7b5c-454d-9383-9ded51b085b0","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Existence Check","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": If no source is provided, the method exits immediately.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"75e43ec8-5afa-46c1-ad74-6416a7302129","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Artifact Normalization (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"process_str","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":")","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"d9dad83c-d6fd-4560-b394-dba8516be17c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This inner function scans namespaces for flags indicating control flow (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"IF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ELSE","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"WHILE","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") or collections (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"LIST","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"DICT","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1e2a7166-82b2-48f6-84f9-3ba501ae49b1","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If found, it reconstructs the namespace by removing the segments containing these flags. For example, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"app.logic.if_22.process","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" would be normalized back to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"app.logic.process","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"ee25f9c4-67e4-4a1e-be17-be7a9bcdcc6d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Return Placeholder Filtering","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": If either the source or destination is a return placeholder (indicated by ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"RETURN_NAME","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), the call is ignored. This keeps the graph focused on calls between functions rather than internal return-value propagation.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ad4dee5b-bd5b-4298-888d-4073efd002e0","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Primitive Type Filtering","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": If the destination is a basic primitive placeholder like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<str>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<int>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the edge is not added. This ensures the graph doesn't show every function "calling" a String or Integer type.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3b1a7d02-97e9-4703-97d6-512529af57a5","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Graph Update","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": After cleaning the namespaces, it registers both entities as nodes and adds the destination to the source's call set.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b4090f13-6bcd-45f7-8157-03be1c6cc11b","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"ca8f5878-5883-4fc7-8fcc-1bd07b80411b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bf6059ec-81ad-4bb4-94dc-6c6ce126551f","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"# Raw analysis might identify a call happening inside an 'if' block
# src: "app.main.if_block_45.run"
# dest: "auth.validate"

# When passed to add_edge:
cg.add_edge("app.main.if_block_45.run", "auth.validate")

# The graph will store a clean relationship:
# "app.main.run" -> "auth.validate"","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"22467fe5-1468-46a3-a138-024938b667f5","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fa88efe2-8adf-4f67-824e-f3161466208a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Noise Reduction","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By cleaning the strings, the method ensures that logic scattered across different branches of an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if/else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" statement is attributed to the parent function, providing a clearer architectural view.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f1e9829a-be21-4e70-9c20-446353431ce4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Logical vs. Physical","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": This method transforms the "physical" analysis path (which includes every block and branch) into a "logical" call graph that developers can easily understand.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"858ffb4f-a627-43dd-ab1c-7ec8cc37cd72","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Idempotency","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Since ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self.cg[src]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a set, calling ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_edge","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" multiple times for the same relationship (e.g., in a loop) will not result in redundant edges.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"05883ad2-0e82-4d18-aa6a-dbb0adb46244","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
